header.gameNote: WEST COAST CONFERENCE MEN'S TOURNAMENT - SEMIFINAL

videos.headline: Ford's left-handed floater helps narrow St. Mary's deficit
videos.description: With 5 seconds left on the shot clock, Jordan Ford drives to the lane then puts up a left-handed floater that banks in for 2.

videos.headline: Ford puts on the moves before draining a 3
videos.description: St. Mary's Jordan Ford fakes out a BYU defender then sinks a shot from distance.

videos.headline: BYU capitalizes on consecutive turnovers
videos.description: On 2 consecutive drives, BYU forces turnovers that lead to Jahshire Hardnett and Elijah Bryant layups.

videos.headline: BYU's Childs sinks a 3 to end the half
videos.description: Yoeli Childs takes a pass from Jahshire Hardnett and sinks a 3-pointer with only seconds remaining in the 1st half.

videos.headline: Childs throws it down for BYU
videos.description: Elijah Bryant passes to a wide open Yoeli Childs who proceeds to throw it down and extend BYU's lead

videos.headline: Flavor Flav spotted at BYU-St.Mary's
videos.description: Public Enemy's Flavor Flav is spotted at the BYU-St.Mary's WCC semifinal in Las Vegas wearing a throwback Patrick Ewing jersey.

videos.headline: BYU's bench erupts after steal and dunk
videos.description: After a BYU steal, Dalton Nixon takes the fast-break pass and throws it down leading the Cougars' bench to erupt.

videos.headline: Childs seals the win for the Cougars
videos.description: McKay Cannon saves a pass which almost lands out of bounds and plays it to Yoeli Childs who hits the jumper, adding to his eventual 33-point total.

videos.headline: Childs says getting to NCAA tournament is 'number 1 on our list'
videos.description: BYU's Yoeli Childs speaks on his career-high 33 points against St. Mary's and the Cougars' goals going into the championship game Tuesday against Gonzaga.

videos.headline: Butler says 'anything can happen' in BYU-Gonzaga championship
videos.description: Caron Butler and Bob Wischusen preview the WCC championship game and how BYU can pull off an upset against Gonzaga if they played the way they did in the semifinal.

article.description: Yoeli Childs scored a career-high 33 points to lead BYU over No. 20 Saint Mary's 85-72 in Monday night's West Coast Conference Tournament semifinals.

video.headline: Childs leads BYU to win over Saint Mary's
video.caption: Yoeli Childs scores a career-high 33 points to propel BYU past Saint Mary's 85-72, setting up a matchup with Gonzaga in the WCC tournament final.
video.description: Yoeli Childs scores a career-high 33 points to propel BYU past Saint Mary's 85-72, setting up a matchup with Gonzaga in the WCC tournament final.
video.title: Childs leads BYU to win over Saint Mary's

article.headline: BYU upends No. 20 Saint Mary's in WCC semifinals

images.name: Childs leads BYU to win over Saint Mary's
images.caption: Yoeli Childs scores a career-high 33 points to propel BYU past Saint Mary's 85-72, setting up a matchup with Gonzaga in the WCC tournament final.

article.linkText: BYU upends No. 20 Saint Mary's in WCC semifinals
article.story: LAS VEGAS -- Yoeli Childs and BYU saved their best game of the season for the right time. Childs scored a career-high 33 points and the Cougars shot 61 percent from the field to beat No. 22 Saint Mary's 85-72 in Monday's West Coast Conference Tournament semifinals. "It was a real good win for us," BYU coach Dave Rose said. "Tonight, they were on it. They shared the ball, made big shots, executed well. It was a well-played game on both sides." The Cougars (24-9) now face No. 7 and top-seeded Gonzaga (29-4) in the championship game Tuesday night as they go for their first WCC Tournament title. "Our reward is Gonzaga," Rose said. "We played them a week before and we look forward to it. We'll start thinking about when we get back to the hotel." Childs was 13 of 18 from the field, including hitting all three 3-point attempts. He also had six rebounds. "The ball was popping around for us (tonight)," Childs said. "We just gave each other energy. We had the mentality to win." Elijah Bryant added 25 points for the Cougars, going 8 of 13 from the field and making all eight free-throw attempts. Jordan Ford led Saint Mary's (28-5) with 27 points and six rebounds. "The biggest problem was at the defensive end," said Saint Mary's coach Randy Bennett, whose team shot 50 percent from the field. "We usually hold them to 40-41 percent (from the field). We gave up 61. We gave them 10 points on hustle plays. When you play good teams at this stage of the season, you can't give teams easy baskets." The Gaels' Jock Landale, who fouled out with 21 seconds left, had 23 points but only four rebounds. Landale committed his third foul with 1:49 left before halftime and fourth with 8:39 left in the game. "Every loss, I've been in foul trouble," Landale said. "I've got to stop making silly plays." CONTRIBUTING COUGARS TJ Haws had 11 points, while Dalton Nixon had 10 points and six rebounds for the Cougars, who will be making their first tournament final appearance in three years. Gonzaga beat BYU twice in the regular season and has won five straight WCC Tournament titles. NO SERIOUS LATE RUN After the Cougars led 41-37 at intermission, they expanded their lead to 67-54 with 7:35 left. Saint Mary's cut it to 71-65 with 3:24 left, but the Cougars' hot shooting helped them pulled away in the final three minutes. Calvin Hermanson had 12 points for Saint Mary's. TIP-INS BYU: The Cougars likely will have to win Tuesday in order to get an NCAA Tournament bid. ... The Cougars reached the WCC final 2014 and 2015. Both Childs and Bryant each now have 13 20-plus point games. ... This is the first time in 10 years the No. 1 and 2 seeds will not face off in the final game. Saint Mary's: This is the first time in three years the Gaels will not be in the WCC final as they struggled in Las Vegas, even having to rally from five points down to beat 10th-seeded Pepperdine (6-26) in the quarterfinals. ... The Gaels are now 11-12 in WCC Tournament semifinal games. They had won five straight against the Cougars coming into Monday night. UP NEXT BYU: The Cougars play in final against Gonzaga Tuesday night. Saint Mary's: The Gaels are expected to receive a NCAA Tournament bid. --- More AP college basketball: https://collegebasketball.ap.org and https://twitter.com/AP-top25

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
